trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time editor in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供在设计宿主中的设计时编辑器如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionEditor"></xref> class using the given <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WizardStepCollectionEditor"></xref>类使用的给定<xref:System.Type>。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of items in the collection.
Indicates whether multiple instances may be selected.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否可以选择多个实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if multiple items can be selected at once; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以在一次; 选择多个项，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此实现始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new form to display and edit the current collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的窗体来显示和编辑当前的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CollectionForm> to provide as the user interface for editing the collection.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CollectionForm>作为用户界面用于编辑集合提供。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.CollectionForm>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the collection of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
Retrieves the data types this collection can contain.
trans-unit.target: 检索此集合可以包含的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation looks in the collection for the Item property and returns the returning Type of the item.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现项属性的集合中查找，并返回项的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor.NewItemTypes%2A> property of the base class.
Use the CreateNewItemTypes method to override the default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CreateNewItemTypes 方法重写的默认实现。
